quotes.quote: I now see how owning our story and loving ourselves through that process is the bravest thing that we will ever do.
To say I love you one must know first how to say the I.
Self-approval and self-acceptance in the now are the main keys to positive changes in every area of our lives.
You can succeed if nobody else believes it, but you will never succeed if you don't believe in yourself.
No amount of self-improvement can make up for any lack of self-acceptance.
Self-acceptance is my refusal to be in an adversarial relationship to myself.
Accept yourself, love yourself, and keep moving forward.
To be nobody but yourself in a world that's doing its best to make you somebody else, is to fight the hardest battle you are ever going to fight. Never stop fighting.
You are very powerful, provided you know how powerful you are.
Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don't need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself.
Self-acceptance has been a blessed by product of middle age.
Change is possible, but it must start with self-acceptance.
Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. Your really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.

When I loved myself enough, I began leaving whatever wasn't healthy. This meant people, jobs, my own beliefs and habits anything that kept me small. My judgement called it disloyal. Now I see it as self-loving.
Accept everything about yourself I mean everything, You are you and that is the beginning and the end no apologies, no regrets.
Acceptance is the key to everything.
You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.

Self-acceptance begets acceptance from others, which begets even deeper, more genuine self-acceptance. It can be done. But no one is going to bestow it on you. It is a gift only you can give yourself.
Self-esteem is the reputation we acquire with ourselves.
I seem to have the blind self-acceptance of the eccentric who can't conceive that his eccentricities are not clearly understood.
Yours is only what you always have on you.
Becoming acquainted with yourself is a price well worth paying for the love that will really address your needs.
My willingness to be intimate with my own deep feelings creates the space for intimacy with another.
The only person who can pull me down is myself, and I'm not going to let myself pull me down anymore.

Forgive yourself. The supreme act of forgiveness is when you can forgive yourself for all the wounds you've created in your own life. Forgiveness is an act of self-love. When you forgive yourself, self-acceptance begins and self-love grows.
A man needs self-acceptance or he can't live with himself; he needs self-criticism or others can't live with him.
The thing that is really hard, and really amazing, is giving up on being perfect and beginning the work of becoming yourself.
Genuine self-acceptance is not derived from the power of positive thinking, mind games or pop psychology. It is an act of the faith in the God of grace.
Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
